item.title: CryptBot Malware Report
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Background CryptBot is an Info-Stealer malware that has been making its rounds this year, 2022, distributed via cracked software and sketchy websites.

item.title: SmokeLoader Unpacking Series
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: In this report, I will demonstrate the methods to unpack a SmokeLoader executable manually.

item.title: REvil Malware Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Summary This report is on the Ransomware as a Service REvil, detailing their techniques, any changes to previous samples they used and their obfuscation techniques.

item.title: HackTheBox Reminiscent Writeup
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Getting Started So for this summer, I decided to focus a little more on the offensive side of cybersecurity.

item.title: Black Basta Ransomware Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction Black Basta ransomware hit American Dental Association on the weekend of the week of 4/17, 2022.

item.title: Danofred's Simple CrackMe WriteUp

item.description: Author: ByridianBlack Challenge Won: April 18th, 2022 Author of Challenge: Danofred

item.title: LIKEAHORSE Malware Report. Uncovering its Secrets
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction LIKEAHORSE is ransomware that garnered news in January, but while it was looked at, I have found no actual report on its features and abilities online.

item.title: Mevlbkxshp Powershell Script Malware Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction Mevlbkxshp is a PowerShell script categorized as a dropper. This malware has many features, most of which are obfuscation techniques and some properties that make it semi-fileless.

item.title: Darkside Malware
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Darkside is ransomware notorious for attacking high-profile industrial control systems and facilities.

item.title: Discord Troll Malware
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: For the past few years, Discord has been a hub for spreading malware, and while they have done much to crack down on this spread, the problem is still prevalent.

item.title: DiffuseGravity
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction VB6 compiler can be treated as a packer because of its translation from what is known as P-code into assembly code.

item.title: Invicea Tunnel Malware Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Initial Analysis & Outside Research Not much is known about this malware or at least not much research has been done on it.

item.title: VBS Dropper Script for Nanocore RAT. Fileless Properties.
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction This piece of malware had some fileless malware properties, but because it copied itself to disk, it cannot be categorized as fileless malware.

item.title: Poweliks Malware Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction I have recently been interested in fileless malware and the different approaches authors have when executing them.

item.title: VBS APT34 Dropper Analysis
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction VBS scripts are malicious codes that can contain PowerShell commands that can severely damage the victim machine.

item.title: Win32/InfoStealer Dexter Malware
item.author: byridianblack@malscope.com (ByridianBlack)
item.description: Introduction Win32/InfoStealer.Dexter is part of a family of malware to steal information such as credit card numbers, passwords, or various techniques.
